ygData.subject: RE: Issues with the new damage.
ygData.msgSnippet: Not for nothing but after checking a few sites I can t find a list of the new enchancements :)  Does anyone have a link? ... From: imari_dellimore@sra.com
ygData.messageBody:
Not for nothing but after checking a few sites I can't find a list of the
new "enchancements" :) Does anyone have a link?

-----Original Message-----
From: imari_dellimore@... [mailto:imari_dellimore@...]
Sent: Monday, January 10, 2000 1:57 PM
To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ-Monks] Issues with the new damage.


From: imari_dellimore@...

Now I am by no means Crazy enough to complain about the impending
enhancements.
But I just wanted to share with some of you issues that we monks wil face
once
the patch goes in. Every monk above level 20 will be doing a good deal more
damage - 15% more by level 50. What this means is that like rogues we will
be
doing "hella taunts" with our whirling fists. I recommend you all dump some
of
your dex and agi gear (keep agi above 120, but drop dex like a rock -
detailed
log studies show it is useless to us!) and switch it out for AC stuff. I
know
I am going to go in all AC gear from now on, concentrating on str as
secondary.
I may also start using easgle strike a bit more (it taunts alot less than
kick
and does almost as much damage).

Just be prepared for a change in tactics and gear once the patch goes live.

Humbly submitted
Inno Thunderfist
